mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_reservation WHERE court_id = #{courtId} AND reservation_date = #{date} AND status != 2 -- 状态不为“已取消”的才算 AND #{startTime} < end_time AND #{endTime} > start_time
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_reservation (user_id, court_id, reservation_date, start_time, end_time, total_cost, status, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{courtId}, #{reservationDate}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{totalCost}, 0, NOW(), NOW())
